#summary Installation.

= Introduction =


= Files =

*/usr/bin/tomcat-check.pl*

The main perl script (daemon).

*/etc/tomcat-check.xml*

   The well formed XML configuration file.  Download an example [http://tomcat-check.googlecode.com/files/tomcat-check.xml here].

*/tmp/tomcat-check-status.xml*

   A temporal file to store the output downloaded from Apache Tomcat Manager via HTTP each time a check is performed by the main perl script.  The URL to download this file is _http://user:password@host:port/manager/status?XML=true_
